questions.question: After watching many hours of 101 Dalmation, I developed this nickname for you.
Name my most recent Hannukah gift to you, in order. (comma-separated, no spaces)
Your code:
I was placed in a different cabin than my two best friends at this overnight camp.
The party of the millennium was almost ruined from a fight between us stemming from this game.
Your code:
Although it may not appear on an "official" transcript, this was the one class we shared in high school. You even have half of a t-shirt to prove it.
As a famous "Pepe" may have once said, you were "waxed" by Sam in FIFA, when he used this popular Spanish player (last name).
Your code:
When writing our national outstanding math modeling paper, a certain member of our team became fixated on this.
This Guitar Hero 3 song was your bread and butter, the first you 100%'ed.
Your code:

We're in Spain. Barcelona, specifically. Actually, doesn't matter where we are. What does matter is that it is 3am and we are having a blast and your flight leaves at 6am. Its a one hour drive to the airport. You don't want to leave. I ask you this question.

You have health and long life, land without rent, and a child every year. You're not in Ireland. But you are playing blackjack and are dealt cards that remind you of us. Dealer shows a 19. You bet $85. You leave the table with this much in your pocket.
Your code:
In Senora Andueza's Spanish class, Jonathan B. and crew shouted this pun, referencing a popular video game series.
Per TJ's 2018 recorded statistical analysis, this person is the best sharp shooter in 21 cup, out-shooting even you.
Your code:
Your dedication to the [same] team inspired me to buy my first NBA jersey, representing this big man (nickname)
This middle school won the Henrico County Tennis Championship.
Your code:
After telling you one of the greatest lies I've ever told to win a game. You, as a true friend, warned me, that this competitor would be targeting me at a soccer match.
As the first of the "Wyndham" bunch that I met, we shared this science teacher at our new school (last name).
Your code:
